verses.name: Psalms 146:1
verses.text: Praise ye the Lord. Praise the Lord, O my soul.

verses.name: Psalms 146:2
verses.text: While I live will I praise the Lord: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.

verses.name: Psalms 146:3
verses.text: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.

verses.name: Psalms 146:4
verses.text: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.

verses.name: Psalms 146:5
verses.text: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the Lord his God:
